Name: Sabir
Description:
Manufacturer: Shubin Interstellar
Item Type: Mining Gadget

Optimal Charge Window Size: +50%
Resistance: -50%

Instability: +15%

Make that tough deposit easier to crack with the Sabir. It uses a special sensor to modulate laser power and adjust it to that particular deposit. The effect increases instability but also provides a dramatic drop in resistance and an increased optimal charge window to make mining it easier. 

Manufacturer Warning! Using more than one mining gadget per deposit can result in a catastrophic explosion.
